instructions: Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 15 1 Open your Android's Image titled Android7settingsapp.png Settings. Tap the gear- or slider-shaped icon in the App Drawer. Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 16 2 Scroll down to the "Accounts" section. You'll find this near the top of the Settings page. You may have to tap Accounts on a Samsung Galaxy phone. Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 17 3 Tap . This will open the Google accounts section. Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 18 4 Select an account. Tap the account that you want to sign out of Gmail. You cannot select the Google account that you used to set up your Android phone. Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 19 5 Tap . It's in the top-right corner of the screen. A drop-down menu will appear. Image titled Log Out of Gmail Step 20 6 Tap . Doing so will remove the Google account from your Android and any apps that use it, including Gmail. [1] Advertisement
